text: Fighting Mad is a 1976 American action drama movie directed by Jonathan Demme and produced by Roger Corman. It stars Peter Fonda, Lynn Lowry, John Doucette, Scott Glenn, Philip Carey and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1976 drama movies Category:1976 action movies Category:American drama movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies directed by Jonathan Demme
title: Fighting Mad
